entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trouble with nested entity with no partition key and with a collection of enum values in Cosmos DB #29558
  • [EF7] Method not found: ... Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.ConventionSet.get_ModelFinalizingConventions() #29557
  • Using IQueryable with record type - InvalidOperationException #29556
  • Adding an existing item to a many-to-many relationship with a custom join entity does not get fixed up by the change tracker #29554
  • Error Code Short Link Not Working #29551
  • Is there any progress on adding a DTABASE NOW approach at the efcore level #29549
  • SqlServer fail to execute datetime where inline #29548

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.31.1 to 3.31.2 #29552
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #29462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
